text: Split String In List While Preserving Original List Order

A couple things I have to mention.
In the above case, I split the string into three sub strings, Mega, Mid, Micro.
Not every string will have a "Mid" and a "Micro" portion of it.
Some of these strings could simply be shorter versions of the same format:
For this case, I'd like to insert a placeholder to preserve the position of each element in the array (so that the numbers in the final position always have the same index).

Any help would be greatly appreciated as I'm really struggling with this one.
